title: Critique on new Script Font
content:
Hi Everybody.

I just uploaded some Pics of my new Project.  
I'm really interested in your Opinion. Right now it was like one complete Week ok Work an i think i want to finish it in one month.  
Lower and Uppercase follow different Rules. The lowercase is much more »scriptlike« than the uppercase.  
I really like this difference but wanted titling-featues for some of the uppercase characters. I think there will be an titl and a final version for every lowercase letter plus a bunch of ligatures.

Feel free to coment. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/promo_blog_02_a_4034.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/promo_blog_02_b_6233.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426231642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/promo_blog_02_c_6029.png)
author: Sascha Timplan

comments.content: This is very interesting, but almost a bit to obviously inspired by Underware.
